reviewText: My granddaughter loves Barney so any DVD of Barney is great at this house.  She still watches it and probably will watch it for years to come!
My granddaughter just loves it. She has to watch it every day. She likes to sing and dance along to it.
My son has always been into Barney, but he loves him so much more now. I'll recommend this to any parent.
Even my 2-year-old grandson, who loves Barney, was totally bored with this "movie" which is just a bunch of excerpts from previous programs.

My 3 year old loves Barney, and she really likes this movie. The Big World Adventure moves at a good pace (for a 3 year old) through various countries and cultures. Each culture is explored through songs and dances.

I got this DVD for my children. It arrived on time.
The kids love it! Barney has always been a favourite for them.

Loved getting to travel in a hot air balloon with Barney in this DVD.
From Spain to Italy and all over!!!
Not only did we learn things that related to that particular geographical location, we also were able to learn the local language!!!
All while having fun!
Perfect
Great purchase in perfect tome
Great

My 10 month old son loves Barney and because we love to travel and learning about other cultures we got his this one for him. I watched it with him the other day and I think it's kinda boring. I think he thinks so too since he doesn't really pay any attention to it. Granted he's only 10 months so he cannot really follow a plot but he's usually glued to the TV with his other Barney movies...like hipnothized glued. I try playing it over and over but he still doesn't care about it. Maybe when he's a little older he will and I will update my review then if anything changes.
Entertaining!
Everybody knows Barney. Still good entertainment for kids under 8.
Easy. Well done.
My granddaughter loves it, but I was never a Barney fan. But it's not for me it's for her.
for my grandson. He loved it so I guess it was ok.
My kids love it. Barney is a lifesaver!

I have it on good authority that my grandson absolutely loves his Barney DVDs.  He is only 2 and has taught himself to insert, play, stop, and remove DVDs.  He  cannot get enough of Barney.
